thread.title: Jeremy Corbyn accuses Tories of “robbing” low paid
thread.title_full: Jeremy Corbyn accuses Tories of “robbing” low paid - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Jeremy Corbyn accuses Tories of “robbing” low paid
text:
10
Have your say Jeremy Corbyn will launch one of the most scathing attacks on the Conservatives of his leadership yet during a speech in Scotland as he accuses the party of “robbing” low paid workers to fund tax cuts for the rich.
In a direct response to David Cameron’s speech attacking Mr Corbyn at the Conservative conference this week, he will accuse the Prime Minister of making a series of “fake claims” about being the party of the workers and one of the centre ground.
Mr Corbyn, speaking at a Scottish Labour dinner in Glasgow tonight, will say Conservative ministers are“ pandering to anti-immigration sentiment” in the UK and are driving low paid workers into poverty with their policies.
